summary: This module offers an annotation based Knative extension implementation for Ballerina.
description:
Module Overview

This module offers an annotation based Knative extension implementation for Ballerina.

For examples on the usage of the operations, see the AWS Lambda Deployment Example.

Annotation Usage Sample:

import ballerina/http;
import ballerina/log;
import ballerina/knative;

@knative:Service {
    name:"hello"
}
listener http:Listener helloEP = new(9090);

@http:ServiceConfig {
    basePath: "/helloWorld"
}
service helloWorld on helloEP {
    resource function sayHello(http:Caller caller, http:Request request) {
        var responseResult = caller->respond("Hello, World from service helloWorld ! ");
        if (responseResult is error) {
            log:printError("error responding", responseResult);
        }
    }
}

fields.name: data
fields.description: Paths to data files.+ port - port value for the containerPort

fields.name: sourceFile
fields.description: source path of the file (in your machine)

fields.name: operator
fields.description: Operator between the key and value. Default is "Equal"

fields.name: tolerationSeconds
fields.description: Time period of toleration in seconds. Default is 0

fields.name: data
fields.description: Paths to data files as an array

fields.name: dockerHost
fields.description: Docker host IP and docker PORT. ( e.g minikube IP and docker PORT) Default is to use DOCKER_HOST environment variable If DOCKER_HOST is unavailable, use "unix:///var/run/docker.sock" for Unix or use "npipe:////./pipe/docker_engine" for Windows 10 or use "localhost:2375"

fields.name: dockerCertPath
fields.description: Docker certificate path. Default is "DOCKER_CERT_PATH" environment variable

fields.name: baseImage
fields.description: Base image for docker image building. Default value is "ballerina/ballerina-runtime:<BALLERINA_VERSION>" Use "ballerina/ballerina-runtime:latest" to use the latest stable ballerina runtime docker image

fields.name: image
fields.description: Docker image name with tag. Default is "<OUTPUT_FILE_NAME>:latest". If field registry is set then it will be prepended to the docker image name as <registry>/<OUTPUT_FILE_NAME>:latest

fields.name: buildImage
fields.description: Docker image to be build or not. Default is true

fields.name: push
fields.description: Enable pushing docker image to registry. Field buildImage must be set to true to be effective. Default value is false

fields.name: copyFiles
fields.description: Array of file configurations for docker image

fields.name: singleYAML
fields.description: Generate a single yaml file with all kubernetes artifacts (services, deployment, ingress and etc). Default is true

fields.name: namespace
fields.description: Kubernetes namespace to be used on all artifacts

fields.name: livenessProbe
fields.description: Enable/Disable liveness probe and configure it. Default is false

fields.name: readinessProbe
fields.description: Enable/Disable readiness probe and configure it. Default is false

fields.name: containerConcurrency
fields.description: concurent request handle by one container instance

fields.name: timeoutSeconds
fields.description: max time the instance is allowed for responding to a request

constants.name: IMAGE_PULL_POLICY_IF_NOT_PRESENT
constants.description: Pull image if it is not present for knative service.

constants.name: IMAGE_PULL_POLICY_ALWAYS
constants.description: Always pull the image for knative service.

constants.name: IMAGE_PULL_POLICY_NEVER
constants.description: Never pull the image for knative service.

annotations.name: HPA
annotations.description: @knative:HPA annotation to configure horizontal pod autoscaler yaml.

unionTypes.name: ImagePullPolicy
unionTypes.description: Image pull policy type field for kubernetes deployment and jobs.

unionTypes.name: TolerationOperator
unionTypes.description: Type of operations between key and value of a toleration.
